overview: Two strangers Aavas and Nisha met in the bus trip  from Kathmandu to Pokhara. Both of them share their opinion regarding life and characters. As they arrived their destination, both of them apart from each other promising not to meet next time. But both meet at Nishaâ€™s home where Aavas is helping his best friend Vinay to plan a wedding to be with Nisha. Then both of them get separated again. But after few years both met each other and face the situation where both realizes their love.
title: Mero Love Story
